lines.text: ...when I come this country, I have no luggage. Today what I got?
You got a chip shop. dad.
Right. Own bloody business, see.
Do you think I'm a good mother?
No, I think you're a friggin' awful mother.
I will never allow my daughters to marry into this jungly family of half-breeds.
Well they may be half-bred, but at least they're not friggin' inbred like those two monstrosities.
God bless.
And Allah be with you
[Annie meets Tariq and Abdul's brides to be]

[sarcastic]
Is it these two. They're bleedin' gorgeous. You're lucky you pair aren't ya. Landin' a couple of belters like these.

[Heard by Mrs Shah from outside, referring to the Shahs' daughters]
Have you seen the state of them two? The one with the teeth's got a mustache like Dad.
Tariq's looks like Quasimodo.
Kids eh. Were your two like that, Mrs. Shah?

[Sternly]
No. I believe in strict discipline. Especially in a NON-Pakistani environment.

[to Mrs. Shah]
Piss of out of my house, and take Laurel and Hardy with you.
Mum! Mum! The Pakis are here!
[Ella throws the Shahs out of the house]
You bastard bitch. You bring shame on the family

No, you should be ashamed, George. Because you're not interested in these kids being happy. You just want to prove to everybody what a great man you are. Because you're ashamed of me, George, and you're ashamed of our kids. And you won't even admit it.
[In the hospital following Sajid's circumcision]
Tickle-Tackle all gone?

[Puzzled]
Circumcision was absolutely fine.
You Indian?

[whispering]
George.

[to Ella]
Bastard Indian.
They filmed "The Dambusters" here.
Mam, you say that EVERYTIME we come to Bradford.
Well they bloody did.
[Abdul and Tariq approach a local nightclub]
All right, Tony, how ya goin' mate?
All right, Bazza?
Yeah, good to see ya. All right, in ya go.
Nice, mate.

[to Abdul]
Where do you think you're going, smiler?
This is our kid, erm...
Arthur, me name's Arthur.
I'll never let the colour of your Dad come between us.
I won't have my son looking like bastard hippie.
Let's elope. That's soooo romantic.
See. You let one of 'em in, and the whole fuckin' tribe turns up.
Sorry about him Mr. Shah. He's just been circumcised.
They'll do anything for you Mrs/ Shah. Good Samaritans they are. Just like in the Bible.
I believe in strict discipline. Especially in a NON-Pakistani environment.
Our Peter knows how far he can go before I knock him to Kingdom Come. And that's just my husband Mrs. Shah.

[to George]
You're wife's a disgrace.
God Bless.
Allah go with you.
Gunga Din! Drinking the white man's brew!
What are you doing here, Abdul?
It's me stag night. I'm gettin' married.
Who to?
Dunno. Me dad hasn't bothered introducing us yet.
Get stuffed!
I'll never let the colour of your Dad come between us. It's not fair coz I love curry an' all.
Yeah. Nice one.
[Ella stops George from beating Maneer]
I your husband. You should agreeing with me like proper Muslim wife!
The children have a right to know.
What do you mean, "right"?
[Saleem accidentally drops a fake vagina on Mrs. Shah's lap]
This is an insult to me and my family! I will never allow my daughters to marry into this jungly family of half-breeds!
Well, they may be half-bred, but at least they're not friggin' inbred like them two monstrosities.
Ella!

Never mind "Ella". Who the frig do you think you are? You come in here, telling me that my house isn't good enough for your daughters? Well, your daughters aren't good enough for my sons, or my house, and if I hear another word against my family, I will stick that fanny over your bastard head!
[Mrs. Shah leaves without a word]

[to George]
Your wife's a disgrace.
Oh, go on, piss off! Go on, sling your bleedin' hook! Go on, piss off! Piss off out of my house! And take Laurel and Hardy with you!
[a lecherous dalmatian leaps onto Mrs. Shah]
Salam Alekom, Mr. Khan.
Malekom Salam.
[Moorhouse and Earnest are distributing leaflets of Enoch Powell as George passes by]
'Ere, look, see? There's one of'em now. Got his bags packed for his way home, heh.

[Respectfully]
Salam Alekom, Mr. Khan.

[Slaps Earnest over the head]
Shut up, you little bastard!
Salam Alekom.
Eh? Bugger off, bugger off.
You can't have this thing puttarrr. It no belong to you.
See puttarrr... this is very special watch. It tell time in... Arabic!
Did you get a load of those two?
[meaning the Shahs' daughters]
The one with the teeth has got a mustache like Dad's!
Tariq's looks like Quasimodo.

[Watching Enoch Powell speaking on TV]
We should have a whip round and get Dad repatriated.
